channel.title: Dxg on Dash
channel.description: Recent content in Dxg on Dash

item.title: DXG ScreenSaver Hack
item.description: First, download the ScreenSavers hacker form: http://www.mobileread.com/forums/showthread.php?t=88004 And unzip this file, copy the “Update_ss_0.43.N_dxg_install.bin” to the root directory of Kindle. Then In kindle, [HOME] -> [MENU] > Settings -> [MENU] > Update Your Kindle. The DXG will automatically reboot. Now mount the DXG into your computer, touch the “last” file under the linkss folder, as: [root@XXXyyy mnt]# cd linkss/ [root@XXXyyy linkss]# ls auto backups cover_cache info.txt overflow screensavers autoreboot bin etc mounted_824x1200 run [root@XXXyyy linkss]# touch last Now reboot your Kindle Again, your Kindle will remain the last read page as the ScreenSaver.
